concept.title: 5325.7002-2 Exceptions

li.p: (b)(1)(iv) When the contracting officer determines through market research, that an article or suitable substitute is not available from a domestic source, the contracting officer must submit a Domestic Non-availability Determination (DNAD) . The DNAD must be submitted through the SCO to SAF/AQC for approval by the Secretary of the Air Force (nondelegable). See MP5325.7002-2 .
